backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing ratings, user profiles, aliases, and comments with access control and map-based storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two rewrite tasks to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries describing functionality of key frontend components and pages.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT-PRODUCTION.md: Guide outlining prerequisites and steps for deploying the Forge AI frontend to mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template with root app mount point and SEO, Open Graph, and Twitter metadata.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing full crawler access and referencing the sitemap for indexing.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Defines sitemap entries listing main application routes, their change frequency, and priority for SEO.
frontend/QA-PRELAUNCH-CHECKLIST.md: Comprehensive QA checklist covering routing, responsiveness, accessibility, motion, CTAs, and SEO before launch.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the app’s routing by mapping all pages and marketplace capability sub-pages to React Router routes.
frontend/src/components/AboutVisionSecti: Renders a marketing section contrasting traditional AI with Forge’s autonomous capabilities using styled content blocks.
frontend/src/components/ActivityFeed.tsx: Displays a timed, animated activity feed with accessibility features and rare variant message substitutions.
frontend/src/components/AgentCard.tsx: Shows a UI card describing an agent’s identity, reputation, and acceptance of a task.
frontend/src/components/AgentSelfOnboard: Presents the agent self-onboarding contract along with capability declaration schemas and example payloads.
frontend/src/components/AiToHumanComingS: Provides a marketing section explaining future human-in-the-loop capabilities for physical-world task completion.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatus.tsx: Handles authentication UI, including login/logout, showing user info, and triggering profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/components/CommentsFeedback: Provides a comments section that lets authenticated users post feedback, view comments, and upvote existing ones.
frontend/src/components/CtaBackButton.ts: Renders a simple back button that navigates browser history backward.
frontend/src/components/DevelopersSectio: Displays a promotional section for deploying AI agents and triggers an auth‑guarded deployment flow.
frontend/src/components/ExecutionPanel.t: Runs a multi‑phase execution flow with animated system messages, agent discovery, and result display for a job request.
frontend/src/components/FooterNote.tsx: Renders a multi‑column footer with navigation links and branding elements.
frontend/src/components/ForgeBrandMark.t: Shows the Forge AI brand text with adjustable sizes and styling.
frontend/src/components/ForgeQuoteCard.t: Displays an animated quote card highlighting Forge's vision with decorative quotation icons.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenNavOve: Full‑screen navigation overlay with focus trapping, ESC handling, and scroll lock, used for mobile menu navigation.
frontend/src/components/GlobalHeader.tsx: Sticky global header with scroll‑aware styling and a hamburger button that opens the full‑screen navigation overlay.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Homepage hero block with branding, headline, input-driven CTA navigation, and conditional resume actions based on user identity.
frontend/src/components/HomeSectionIndex: Sticky footer providing quick-jump buttons to homepage sections with smooth scrolling and keyboard support.
frontend/src/components/JumpToFooter.tsx: Floating button that scrolls smoothly (or instantly) to a referenced footer element.
frontend/src/components/MagicalOnboardin: Survey section offering selectable workflow templates that navigate users to demo-lab with preset prompts.
frontend/src/components/MarketingSection: Reusable marketing header component that renders a title, optional subtitles, micro‑statements, and custom children.
frontend/src/components/MarketplaceDisco: Marketplace discovery UI with mode toggle, free‑form workflow input, and preset template selectors that route to demo-lab.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for capturing a user’s name, saving the profile via mutation, and showing success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/ProgressiveDiscl: Expandable collapsible component with animated trigger and content.
frontend/src/components/RatingStars.tsx: Star rating widget that loads existing ratings, handles auth, and submits ratings for a job.
frontend/src/components/ResultReveal.tsx: Animated result display showing title, description, optional deliverable, metadata, and rating section.
Interactive multi-year roadmap timeline with selectable milestones and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/RotatingPlacehol: Text input with rotating placeholder suggestions and submit-on-enter behavior.
frontend/src/components/TrustComplianceS: UI strip listing trust and compliance features with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/TrustedMetricsBa: Performance metrics display pulling live platform stats and rendering them in cards.
Centralized copy for Explore and Demo Lab flows including labels, headings, and CTAs.
frontend/src/content/lexicon.ts: Shared terminology definitions and preferred vocabulary for consistent agent-related language.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAgentFirstMode.ts: Tracks a boolean agent-first UI mode in sessionStorage and provides a toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthGuard.ts: Provides an auth guard that triggers Internet Identity login when required.
frontend/src/hooks/useComments.ts: Handles fetching, adding, and upvoting comments using the backend actor with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCtaNavigation.ts: Wraps navigation to mark transitions as CTA-driven for UI behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Updates the browser document title based on the current route.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity state, login/logout logic, and identity persistence via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlatformPerformanc: Generates simulated platform metrics that update periodically without backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects and subscribes to the user’s reduced‑motion preference.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides user profile, rating, and last‑task queries and mutations through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouteMeta.ts: Supplies route‑based meta descriptions and OG titles for SEO on navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollBehavior.ts: Enables smooth or instant scroll‑to‑top and section scrolling respecting reduced‑motion settings.
Tracks scroll positions per route and restores them on popstate navigation while disabling default browser behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useSectionEntryMotion: Uses IntersectionObserver to detect when a section enters view and trigger motion unless reduced-motion is preferred.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme tokens, motion settings, and typography plus reduced‑motion‑aware scrolling.
frontend/src/layouts/RootLayout.tsx: Root layout providing global header/footer, background layers, scroll behavior management, and CTA-based back button handling.
frontend/src/lib/demo/canonicalWatcherDe: Backwards‑compatible wrapper that generates demo output by delegating to template‑based demo generation.
frontend/src/lib/demo/executionTemplates: Generates template‑driven demo data with feed steps and structured deliverables for research, ops, and other workflows.
frontend/src/lib/demo/promptTemplates.ts: Defines prompt templates mapping categories and featured jobs to specific execution template types.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging Tailwind and conditional class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React root, query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/motion/sectionEntryProfiles: Collection of motion profile configs defining timing, easing, and intensity for section‑entry animations.
frontend/src/motion/SectionEntryReveal.t: Component applying motion profiles and reveal animations using section entry detection.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page explaining Forge AI, its agent marketplace model, and why it runs on the Internet Computer. Contains multiple sections outlining outcomes-based workflows and on-chain autonomy.
frontend/src/pages/AgentSelfOnboardingPa: Displays the self-onboarding protocol for autonomous agents, including capability schemas, escrow rules, execution guarantees, and settlement semantics. Includes structured explanations and ICP rationale.
frontend/src/pages/BuildPage.tsx: Provides an overview of building autonomous agents on Forge with sections on benefits and getting started. Uses styled components and navigation to guide developers.
frontend/src/pages/DemoLabPage.tsx: Implements an interactive demo lab where users submit prompts, run jobs, and get agent execution previews. Manages template recommendations, job IDs, authentication, and execution state.
frontend/src/pages/DevelopersPage.tsx: Simple wrapper page that introduces developer-focused content and renders the DevelopersSection component.
frontend/src/pages/DocsPage.tsx: Renders documentation explaining core Forge concepts like autonomous execution, agent coordination, and on-chain settlement with styled informational sections.
frontend/src/pages/ExplorePage.tsx: Interactive explore page letting users enter free‑form prompts or choose templates, then navigating to the demo lab with the selected prompt.
frontend/src/pages/ForgeHomePage.tsx: Landing page showcasing Forge’s value, hero messaging, and navigation CTAs with animated section reveals.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with explanatory sections and an AuthStatus component.
frontend/src/pages/marketplace/Capabilit: Explains how agents hire other agents, outlining capabilities, workflows, and examples within the marketplace. Includes navigation and styled informational sections.
Describes human-in-the-loop controls for agent workflows, detailing approval gates, guardrails, and example use cases. Provides structured sections with capabilities and navigation.
Covers long‑running workflows where agents maintain state and operate over extended periods. Highlights capabilities like scheduling, persistence, and recovery with example use cases.
React page describing multi‑agent collaboration with explanations, feature lists, and use‑case examples.
React page outlining task‑driven agents, their autonomous workflow abilities, key capabilities, and example use cases.
frontend/src/pages/MarketplacePage.tsx: Marketplace overview describing autonomous agent coordination with an example multi‑agent workflow and CTA navigation.
frontend/src/pages/PlaybooksPage.tsx: Playbooks page presenting human guidance and machine specs for job requests along with structured output examples.
frontend/src/pages/RoadmapPage.tsx: Roadmap page showing the product timeline and a feedback section with comments and contact info.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Renders the Support page with contact info, donation address copy functionality, and explanations of ICP and ckBTC. Includes a CommentsFeedback component and interactive clipboard copying.
frontend/src/pages/VisionPage.tsx: Displays the overarching product vision and detailed examples of autonomous agent orchestration. Provides narrative sections describing workflows and future capabilities.
frontend/src/utils/jobId.ts: Generates unique jobIds using timestamp and random seed and validates their format.
frontend/src/utils/rareVariants.ts: Provides deterministic rare text variants based on jobId hashing, plus predefined agency variant sets.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Utility for formatting UTC timestamps in short and long formats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, spacing, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins.
frontend/VERIFICATION-NOTES-PRODUCTION.m: Production deployment verification template for confirming routing, SEO artifacts, scroll behavior, and authentication.
project_state.json: Project metadata capturing app purpose, feature set, and versioned capability descriptions.
